thread.title: Chinese Companies Share Investors’ Pain
thread.title_full: Chinese Companies Share Investors’ Pain - WSJ

author: Jacky Wong
title: Chinese Companies Share Investors’ Pain
text:
Chinese beer maker Lanzhou Huanghe Enterprise Co. had a stellar first half, posting a nearly 12-fold jump in profits.
Yet the company didn’t sell more beer. Nearly all of its profit increase came from a big bet on Chinese stocks.
Among the investors participating in China’s market mania were many Chinese companies: At the end of June,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
